LanguageData.GR_GeneticAlteration.label: 基因编改
LanguageData.GR_GeneticAlteration.description: 解锁建造用于提取基因物质的「基因提取台」和用于制作基因构造框架的「生物组织粉碎机」。
LanguageData.GR_GeneticAlteration.generalRules.rulesS: subject_story->踏上了操纵生命蓝图的旅程，制作工具来解开和重新编织遗传线索
subject_story->创建了组织研磨机和基因组提取台，这是探索和利用遗传潜力的关键工具
subject_gerund->为生物学与创造力相遇的未来奠定基础
LanguageData.GR_GeneticEngineering.label: 基因塑造
LanguageData.GR_GeneticEngineering.description: 解锁建造用于培养孵化混种生物的「基因塑造仪」和「电力孵化器」，以及用于制作改良剂的「基因工作台」。
LanguageData.GR_GeneticEngineering.generalRules.rules: subject_story->超越传统育种，利用基因形态创造新的生命形式
subject_story->迎来了电子宫时代，妊娠成为一个由精确性和意图引导的过程
subject_gerund->用富有远见的双手塑造生活世界
LanguageData.GR_GeneticDuplication.label: 基因复制
LanguageData.GR_GeneticDuplication.description: 解锁建造用于复制现有基因物质的「基因复制仪」。
LanguageData.GR_GeneticDuplication.generalRules.rules: subject_story->mastered the art of genomic replication, ensuring valuable genetic traits can be preserved and replicated
subject_story->innovated with the Genome Recombinator, a breakthrough in the efficient duplication of genetic material
subject_gerund->duplicating the essence of life for prosperity and progress
LanguageData.GR_HybridImplantology.label: 基因强化
LanguageData.GR_HybridImplantology.description: 解锁培养用于强化动物和混种生物的「动物植入物」。
LanguageData.GR_HybridImplantology.generalRules.rules: subject_story->pioneered the growth of bio-engineered implants, merging organic life with enhancements
subject_story->explored the possibilities of augmentation, not just for survival but for the evolution of abilities
subject_gerund->cultivating the next step in organismal advancement
LanguageData.GR_GeneticCompatibility.label: 基因亲和
LanguageData.GR_GeneticCompatibility.description: 通过调谐人类基因与其他基因间的亲和性，解锁培养各种各样的「人类植入物」。
LanguageData.GR_GeneticCompatibility.generalRules.rul: subject_story->extended the boundaries of bio-engineering to humans, ensuring compatibility between their biology and the myriad forms of life
subject_story->focused on the harmony of existence, where human potential can be expanded through genetic synergy
subject_gerund->harmonizing human essence with the genetic chorus of the cosmos
LanguageData.GR_GeneticMechahybridization.label: 基因机械改造
LanguageData.GR_GeneticMechahybridization.description: 解锁建造用于搜寻机械生物改造厂的「机械生物实验基地信标」，以及用于控制机械生物的「机械生物信号塔」。
LanguageData.GR_GeneticMechahybridization.generalRule: subject->the synthesis of organic and machine
subject_story->ventured into uncharted territories, blending organic life with mechanoid essence to birth new forms of existence
subject_story->established the Biomechanical Lab, a beacon for those who dare to redefine life's boundaries
subject_gerund->forging the future with strands of DNA and circuits entwined
